channel.title: DeltaScape Combat
channel.description:
This is a serious Thread, Noobs gtfo
Now, Which part of the DeltaScape combat needs to be worked on? If somebody can give me the parts that are bad and need to be fixed up i will be grateful :)

item.title: DeltaScape Combat
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

I have recently downloaded the DeltaScape source released by Delta_. The one where the run.bat file goes “null…null…null…” infinite times. I removed that and a bunch of other things and got it to run. But when I try to attack an npc it gives the following error:

Error with player 1, Ghostly
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.followDirection(client.java:2
        at client.process(client.java:14855)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.
        at process.run(process.java:23)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I have been researching in the files and over the interwebs but I haven’t found anything yet. I just say this thread and decided what the heck might as well let someone know about this. I still will be researching this though so I’m not giving up like some people who just post their problem for someone else to solve, I’m just looking for some pointers.

Read full topic
